about_the_game:
The Demo is here!

- ABOUT THIS GAME -


Scions: Battle Eternal is a skill-based action rogue-like game...

The players will have a number of characters to choose from and guide them on maps with different themes using keyboard & mouse controls.
The aim is to navigate through randomly generated levels to reach the final boss. Each kill will reward the player with experience which will grant the player new skills and abilities to destroy even stronger enemies. The playing character will also level up with each run and gain access to new talents corresponding to its level. The talent tree will grant the player a total of three talents to choose from at certain level thresholds, giving the player to differentiate play style and tactical approach. As the game progresses, the player will accumulate coins to unlock new player characters, maps, bosses, skills and skins.

Scions are those whose souls are harvested after their death by the elders to be evolved into a weapon of destruction.
As a Scion, your aim is to endure/defeat as many enemies as possible to gather gold & souls to evolve and level up your character while unlocking new enemies, Scions, and maps. As you progress, you’ll be able to combine multiple skills to create new ones and mow down your adversaries with ease!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (or higher)
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.5-2.7 GHZ
  • Graphics: Intel(R) Integrated Graphics - Lowest Tested so far was HD Graphics 530

short_description: Become the Scion, an evergrowing weapon of destruction of the Elders! In this action rogue-like / dungeon crawler, you will crush your enemies on procedurally generated and thematically diverse settings, evolving your scion and unlocking new maps, character classes, talents, and more
